root.name: Formula One Grand Prix
root.description: Critical ReceptionWhen the Genesis version was releaded in 1993 Electronic Gaming Monthly gave the scores of 8,8,8 and 7 out of ten. Martin Alessi, who gave one of the higher scores, wrote, "By far this is one of the best racing games that I've played on the Genesis in a long time. The gameplay is incredible and the number of options available keeps things interesting. I love the Turbo mode because the action really starts to fly when you get into fifth gear. This driver is actually Activator [a driving wheel] friendly, and if you don't mind looking silly, it can be a lot of fun. Smooth graphics are the highlight for this cart".
